comments:
Description:
NPE will  be thrown out when apply a pre-define style with font-size to a template report item

Steps to reproduce:
1.New a library and add a pre-define style "label" in default theme
2.Set font size to 20pt in "label"
3.New a template, add a label and revert it to template report item
4.Include the library into the template and specify "default theme" for the  template
5.Close the template and reopen it

Expected result:
No exception

Actual result:
java.lang.NullPointerException

ReportTemplateElement is the only exception that is a DesignElemtn but doesn't have Style attached.

NPE will be thrown out following the steps above except the pre-define style "grid" apply for the template element (grid).

Note: pre-define style "label" for template element has been fixed. but problem still exists for other pre-define style

have Style attached.
Check if handle.getPrivateStyle() return null.
